meanings.definition: Having a back that is arched downward.
meanings.sent1: The old chair was swaybacked and uncomfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: The swaybacked bridge creaked under the weight of the passing cars.
meanings.sent3: The swaybacked sofa looked like it had seen better days.
meanings.sent4: The swaybacked roof sagged under the weight of the heavy snow.
meanings.sent5: The swaybacked tree leaned over as if tired from years of standing tall.

meanings.definition: A horse with a back that is arched downward.
meanings.sent1: The swaybacked horse trotted slowly around the field.
meanings.sent2: The swaybacked pony was gentle and patient with the children.
meanings.sent3: The swaybacked mare seemed to enjoy showing off her unique posture.
meanings.sent4: The swaybacked stallion stood proudly despite his unusual appearance.
meanings.sent5: The swaybacked colt struggled to carry the heavy load on its back.
